title: ENVE’s US-made carbon wheels are sold out until 2022…but why?
content:
Considering they make their carbon rims in house, and build the wheels in house here in the States, why are ENVE’s wheels completely out of stock until spring 2022? Yet, their $10,000 custom road bike, which is also made in-house in Ogden, Utah, will start delivering this summer. Even more confusing is why their cockpit […]

The post ENVE’s US-made carbon wheels are sold out until 2022…but why? appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
